amendment.description: Amendment transfers $1 million within the Departmental Administration Account for the Department of Energy for the purpose of funding environmental justice programs for minority groups.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $1 million within the Departmental Administration Account for the Department of Energy for the purpose of funding environmental justice programs for minority groups.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
